entities.name: IBM
entities.description: A multinational technology and consulting company offering a wide range of products and services including business intelligence, data warehousing solutions, server management, server virtualization platforms, and software development tools.

entities.name: ORACLE
entities.description: A multinational computer technology corporation that sells database software and technology, cloud engineered systems, and enterprise software products.

entities.name: SAP
entities.description: A German multinational software corporation that makes enterprise software to manage business operations and customer relations.

entities.name: BMC
entities.description: A company providing software solutions to manage IT infrastructure and services, including server management and server virtualization platforms.

entities.name: CA TECHNOLOGIES
entities.description: A multinational corporation providing software solutions for IT management and cybersecurity, including server management and server virtualization platforms.

entities.name: HEWLETT-PACKARD
entities.description: A multinational information technology company providing products, technologies, software, solutions, and services to individuals and businesses.

entities.name: VMWARE
entities.description: A company providing cloud computing and virtualization technology and services.

entities.name: ADOBE
entities.description: A multinational computer software company known for its multimedia and creativity software products, as well as digital marketing software.

entities.name: ECLIPSE
entities.description: An open-source integrated development environment (IDE) sponsored by CA Technologies, IBM, Oracle, and SAP.

entities.name: PHP
entities.description: A popular general-purpose scripting language that is especially suited to web development.

entities.name: RUBY ON RAILS
entities.description: A server-side web application framework written in Ruby under the MIT License.
